topics.body:
"@Zak_Inc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/548b5bb86368725324520400#post_548b5bb86368725324520400
That video is the only "official" video, but other than that the only official things are the character bios MysteryBen made and whatever he claims canon on his Tumblr.

As for the backstory on the video itself, I could be here all day if I decided to explain every little detail about the video to the best of my ability. I could do it, but it would just take a while to do.

Here are the character bios if you're interested:
!http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/875/226/70f.gif!
!http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/875/228/d22.gif!
!http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/876/688/f02.gif!
!http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/878/871/5ef.gif!
